mapper.select: SELECT o.owner_id as ownerId, o.parent_id as parentId, o.regcode, o.owner_name as ownerName, o.owner_telephone as ownerTelephone, o.weixin_id, o.reg_time, o.reg_effec_day, o.first_login_time, o.use_effec_day, o. STATUS, o.residential_id as residentialId, o.call_id, o.terminal_type, o.note, o.lingling_id as linglingId, o.visitor_authority, o.owner_gender as ownerGender, o.owner_race, o.owner_birthday as ownerBirthday, o.owner_census_addr, o.owner_iden_number, o.iden_img_id, o.phone_IMEI, o.longitude, o.latitude, o.owner_police, r.residential_id, r.region_id, r.residential_code, r.residential_name as residentialName, r.manager_name, r.telephone, r.address, r.time, r.user_id, r.residential_type, r.start_time, r.end_time, r. STATUS, r.note FROM sv_owner o LEFT JOIN sv_residential r ON o.residential_id = r.residential_id WHERE o.owner_telephone = #{phone}

SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.account, u.name, u.sex, u.mobile_phone as mobilePhone, u.email, u.address, u.password, u.dept_id as deptId, u.type_id as typeId, u.status_id as statusId, u.note, r.residential_id as residentialId, r.region_id as regionId, r.residential_code as residentialCode, r.residential_name as residentialName, r.manager_name as managerName, r.telephone, r.address, r.time, r.user_id, r.residential_type, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.status, r.note FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_residential ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sv_residential r ON r.residential_id = ur.residential_id WHERE u.mobile_phone = #{phone}

SELECT d.device_id as deviceId, d.name as name, d.family_id as familyId, d.device_type as deviceType, d.device_code, d.mac, d.default_mac, d.wifi_ssid, d.wifi_password, d.bluetooch_name, d.bluetooch_password, d.lock_type, d.lock_interval, d.last_synchro_time, d. STATUS, d.region_id, d.custom_type, d.residential_type, d.note, d.v3_device_id, d.is_online, d.x_coordinate, d.y_coordinate, d.mark, d.lock_status, d.make_time FROM sv_owner o LEFT JOIN sv_owner_device od ON o.owner_id = od.owner_id LEFT JOIN sv_device d ON d.device_id = od.device_id WHERE o.owner_id = #{ownerId} LIMIT #{first}, #{count}

SELECT o.owner_id, o.parent_id, o.regcode, o.owner_name, o.owner_telephone, o.weixin_id, o.reg_time o.reg_effec_day, o.first_login_time, o.use_effec_day, o. STATUS, o.residential_id, o.call_id, o.terminal_type, o.note, o.lingling_id, o.visitor_authority, o.owner_gender, o.owner_race, o.owner_birthday, o.owner_census_addr, o.owner_iden_number, o.iden_img_id, o.phone_IMEI, o.longitude, o.latitude, o.owner_police FROM sv_owner o WHERE o.residential_id = #{residentialId};

SELECT o.owner_id as ownerId, o.regcode, o.owner_name as ownerName, o.owner_telephone as ownerTelephone, o.weixin_id, o.reg_time, o.reg_effec_day, o.first_login_time, o.use_effec_day, o. STATUS, o.residential_id, o.call_id, o.terminal_type, o.note, o.lingling_id, o.visitor_authority, o.owner_gender as ownerGender, o.owner_race as ownerRace, o.owner_birthday as ownerBirthday, o.owner_census_addr as ownerCensusAddr, o.owner_iden_number, o.iden_img_id, o.phone_IMEI, o.longitude, o.latitude, o.owner_police FROM sv_owner o WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sv_residential r LEFT JOIN sys_user_residential ur ON r.residential_id = ur.residential_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{ownerId} AND o.residential_id = r.residential_id )

SELECT vq.code_id as codeId, vq.owner_id as ownerId, vq.code_data, vq.code_type as codeType, vq.visitor_name as visitorName, vq.visitor_telephone as visitorTelephone, vq.visitor_gender as visitorGender, vq.is_drive, vq.visitor_purpose as visitorPurpose, vq.make_reason as makeReason, vq.make_time as makeTime, vq.start_time as startTime, vq.end_time as endTime, vq.effec_number as effecNumber, vq. STATUS, vq.v3_code_id, vq.user_id FROM sv_visitor_qrcode vq WHERE vq.owner_id = #{ownerId} LIMIT #{first}, #{count}

SELECT r.residential_id, r.region_id, r.residential_code, r.residential_name, r.manager_name, r.telephone, r.address, r.time, r.user_id, r.residential_type, r.start_time, r.end_time, r. STATUS, r.note, room.room_number, room. STATUS, room.note FROM sv_room room LEFT JOIN sv_residential r ON room.residential_id = r.residential_id WHERE r.residential_id = #{residentialId};
